title: Self-Regulated Learning Chatbot Design in Higher Education: Action Research-Based Collaborative Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Students perform VR-based science experiments via BYOD, with chatbots supporting self-regulated learning; summative assessment-centered progression

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate an 80% or higher goal achievement rate in science experiment tasks by utilizing self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can propose five or more functional requirements for a chatbot through a collaborative design workshop.
Learners can improve their learning process three or more times by applying the action research cycle (plan-act-observe-reflect).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
